item.description:
Welcome to Westborough Spirituality meeting group.

Last month, we had a great meeting. Thanks to Bill, Deb, Donna, Fred, Gregory and Peter.
We discussed enlightenment, self reflection and self-realization. When we understand ourselves better, it is easier to detach and let go a lot of things. How can we practice all the knowledge into our life...etc?

This month, we can share more about our spiritual life and how we practice in our daily life!

I would like to welcome all the friends with peaceful mind to join!

If you would like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.

Happy Summer and let's creat peaceful energy to the whole world.

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: 2nd building on the right when you drive into Carlton Garden Condos. or call 617-223-7166 if you can't find it.
item.name: Westborough Spirituality July Meetup
